add-success: Requests for dessert have been successfully added.
add-error: Error. Failed to add requests for dessert.
update-success: Requests for dessert have been successfully updated.
update-error: Error. The dessert requests could not be updated.
delete-success: Requests for dessert are deleted, because all columns are equal to 0.
delete-error: Error. Failed to delete requests for dessert.
choose-dessert: Choose new dessert to add requests.
must-be-non-zero: At least one of the columns must be non-zero.
